sentences.en: As a magician, his reputation spread all over the world.
sentences.cn: 作为一个魔术师，他的名声传播到了世界各地。

sentences.en: Bevan was a magician with words.
Gold is the great magician of earth - it realises our dreams.
sentences.cn: 有钱能使鬼推磨,钱财能实现我们的梦想.

sentences.en: He juggled the three big rolls of bread like a magician.
sentences.cn: 他象个魔术师似的把三个面包卷在手里耍了一阵.

sentences.en: He wants to be a magician.
I gasped in / with astonishment at the magician's skill.
sentences.cn: 那魔术师技艺惊人,我不禁倒抽一口凉气.

sentences.en: I wonder if I am visiting the house of a magician.
sentences.cn: 我不晓得我是否在访问一位魔术师的住宅.

sentences.en: Roll up, roll up! See how the magician performs his tricks!
sentences.cn: 快来看，快来看!看看魔术师怎么表演他的魔术!

sentences.en: The children's eyes goggled as the magician pulled a rabbit out of the empty hat.
sentences.cn: 当魔术师从空帽子中拉出兔子时，孩子们瞪大眼睛看着。

sentences.en: The magician deceived us by making us think the box was empty.
sentences.cn: 魔术师让我们以为箱子是空的,让我们上当.
魔术师使孩子们着了迷.

sentences.en: The magician foretold the man's death.
sentences.cn: 魔法师预言了那个人的死期.

sentences.en: The magician held his wand over the handkerchief and out hopped a rabbit.
sentences.cn: 那位魔术师将魔棒在手帕上一挥,就蹦出了一只兔子.

sentences.en: The magician produced bunches of flowers out of his gloved hands.
sentences.cn: 魔术师从戴着手套的手里变出一束束鲜花.

sentences.en: The magician transformed the man into a rabbit.
sentences.cn: 魔术师把那个人变成了兔子.

sentences.en: The magician vanished in a puff of smoke.
sentences.cn: 魔术师在一股烟雾中突然不见了。

sentences.en: There was a magician at the party.
sentences.cn: 有个魔术师参加了联欢会.

sentences.en: There'll be a magician at the kids' Christmas party.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的圣诞聚会上会有一位魔术师。

sentences.en: With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish.
sentences.cn: 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了.

words.tran_cn: 不可思议的；有魔力的；魔术的

trans.tran_cn: 魔术师，巫师，变戏法的人
trans.tran_en: an entertainer who performs magic tricks
